def transform_text(text):

    # Split text into sentences for more formal treatment
    sentences = text.split(". ")

            elif word.lower() == "you":

            else:

        transformed_sentences.append(transformed_sentence.strip())

    transformed_text = ". ".join(transformed_sentences)
